commit.message:
Update dependencies from https://github.com/dotnet/arcade build 20201221.2

Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk
 From Version 1.0.0-beta.20580.3 -> To Version 1.0.0-beta.20621.2

nodes.body: I remember taking a one-off Arcade update for 16.8 (builds were broken otherwise) but not setting up a subscription. Is this just stale?

I asked Nathan to add a darc subscription for the 16.8 branch.
`darc get-subscriptions --target-repo dotnet/msbuild`
```
https://github.com/dotnet/arcade (.NET 3 Eng) ==> 'https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild' ('vs16.8')
  - Id: b338d273-e8d0-4c97-2907-08d89c6af29b
  - Update Frequency: EveryDay
  - Enabled: True
  - Batchable: False
  - Merge Policies:
    Standard
  - Last Build: 20201130.3 (7ee8c2b620e66b3762d7a5a688dee8238770c86a)
```

I believe I asked him to create the subscription so we could get an automated PR to ensure smooth approvals/merge. I'll remove the subscription and close this PR, I don't think we **need** to take this. Feel free to ping me or reopen this if it should be merged.
